About the Job
We are seeking a motivated AI Intern to join our team and contribute to exciting Projects in machine learning and artificial intelligence. The ideal candidate will have a strong foundation in Web app development and machine learning concepts. This (unpaid) internship provides a unique opportunity to work alongside experienced professionals and gain hands-on experience in developing AI solutions.
Job Responsibilities
Assist in the design and implementation of machine learning models.
Analyze large datasets to extract insights and improve model performance.
Collaborate with team members on various AI projects, contributing to data preprocessing, model training, and evaluation.
Participate in brainstorming sessions to identify new areas for AI applications.
Document processes and results for internal use and reporting.
Requirements
Current college student, or recent graduate.
Applicants must be pursuing or have a completed Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Healthcare Technology, or a related field. Those with equivalent work experience will be considered.
Graduate’s or Currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science, Information technology, Machine Learning, or a related field.
Familiarity with machine learning framework and web applications.
Proficiency in programming languages such as, Web application.
Basic understanding of AI and machine learning techniques.
Strong problem-solving skills and a willingness to learn.
Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.
Preferred Qualifications
AI / Machine knowledge is required.
A good hands on knowledge of web applications is good.
